A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'd say it was one of my most favorite Star Wars movies. The only part I didn't like was how Rose defied physics (or maybe her speeder was just faster) and smashed into Finn. I think maybe she should have hesitated to follow the order and stuck with him\, then after seeing what he was planning\, smash into him. That would have made more sense. But other than that\, I think that everything was beautifully executed. \nFans get upset when their expectations aren't met\, and this movie shattered every single one of them.
